drinks.strInstructions: PLACE highball glass filled with ice under machine. DISPENSE vodka, tonic water into glass. STIR gently with a spoon. GARNISH with lime peel.
FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE whiskey, sweet vermouth, bitters into shaker. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into chilled cocktail glass. GARNISH with maraschino cherry.
FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE tequila, triple sec, lime juice into shaker. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into chilled cocktail glass with salt rim. GARNISH with lime peel.
PLACE highball glass filled with ice under machine. DISPENSE rum, lime juice, ginger beer into glass. STIR gently with a spoon. GARNISH with lime peel.

FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE vodka, gin, rum, tequila, triple sec, lemon syrup into shaker. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into highball glass filled with ice. PLACE glass under machine. DISPENSE Coca Cola into glass. GARNISH with lemon slice.
FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE gin, dry vermouth into shaker. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into chilled cocktail glass. GARNISH with olive.
FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE rum, pineapple juice, grenadine into shaker. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into chilled cocktail glass. GARNISH with maraschino cherry.
Shake scotch, dry vermouth, and grapefruit juice with ice, strain into a cocktail glass—a bright, citrusy sip with a Miami beachfront vibe.
Stir bourbon, Southern Comfort, and coffee liqueur with ice, strain into a cocktail glass—a bold, dark sip with a cowboy’s late-night grit.
FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE vodka, coffee liqueur into shaker. ADD cream from fridge. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into chilled cocktail glass. GARNISH with mint.
PLACE chilled champagne flute under machine. DISPENSE orange juice, prosecco into glass. STIR gently with a spoon. GARNISH with orange slice.
FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE whiskey, simple syrup into shaker. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. GARNISH with mint.
Shake light rum, dark rum, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice, strain into a punch bowl, top with soda water, garnish with a lemon slice—a Southern punch with a fruity, fizzy flair.

FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE rum, lime juice, simple syrup into shaker. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into highball glass filled with ice. PLACE glass under machine. DISPENSE soda water into glass. GARNISH with mint.
Muddle mint leaves with simple syrup and lemon juice in a highball glass, add rum, fill with ice, top with soda water—a slightly simpler mojito with the same refreshing spirit.
FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE gin, orange juice, grenadine into shaker. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into chilled cocktail glass. GARNISH with orange peel.
PLACE highball glass filled with ice under machine. DISPENSE rum, grapefruit juice into glass. STIR gently with a spoon. GARNISH with lime peel.
Pour whiskey, grapefruit juice, and lemon juice over ice in a highball glass, top with soda water, garnish with a lemon slice—a bright, citrusy sip with a moonlit glow.
FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE tequila, triple sec, lime juice into shaker. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into chilled cocktail glass. GARNISH with lime peel.
Layer Kahlua, Baileys, and vodka in a shot glass—a smooth, creamy shot with a comforting, milky sweetness.
PLACE highball glass filled with ice under machine. DISPENSE vodka, lime juice, ginger beer into glass. STIR gently with a spoon. GARNISH with lime peel.
Pour vodka, pineapple juice, and orange juice over ice in a highball glass, top with soda water, garnish with a lime wedge—a bright, fruity sip with a refreshing lift.

Shake bourbon, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice, top with blackberry liqueur, garnish with a lemon slice—a tart, fruity bramble with a mountain twist.
PLACE highball glass filled with ice under machine. DISPENSE Jägermeister, lime juice, ginger beer into glass. STIR gently with a spoon. GARNISH with lime peel.
FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE vodka, blue curaçao into shaker. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into chilled cocktail glass. GARNISH with orange peel.
PLACE old-fashioned glass filled with ice under machine. DISPENSE gin, sweet vermouth, Campari into glass. STIR gently with a spoon. GARNISH with orange slice.
Shake rum, grapefruit juice, lime juice, and simple syrup with ice, strain into a cocktail glass—a tart, fruity sip with a desert-inspired twist.
Shake whiskey, lime juice, and simple syrup with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, add a dash of grenadine, garnish with an orange twist—a tart, Big Apple-inspired sip.
FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE whiskey, lemon syrup, simple syrup into shaker. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. GARNISH with lemon slice.
Pour gin and Midori into a shot glass, top with orange juice—a bright, green shot with a playful, turtle-powered punch.
FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE vodka, triple sec, lemon syrup into shaker. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into highball glass filled with ice. GARNISH with lemon slice.
FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE Irish whiskey, coffee liqueur into shaker. ADD cream from fridge. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into chilled cocktail glass. GARNISH with nutmeg.
FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE whiskey, coffee liqueur, cinnamon into shaker. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into chilled cocktail glass. GARNISH with cinnamon.

FILL SHAKER with ice. DISPENSE rum, lime juice, simple syrup into shaker. SHAKE with ice for 10-15 seconds. STRAIN into chilled cocktail glass. PLACE glass under machine. DISPENSE prosecco into glass. GARNISH with mint.
Stir gin, Lillet Blanc, orange bitters, and creme de noyaux with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with an orange twist—a refined, bitter-sweet sip with a British schoolboy charm.
